title: Big Buck Bunny
description: A giant rabbit with a heart bigger than himself. When one sunny day three rodents rudely harass him, something snaps... and the bunny goes bad.

title: Sintel
description: A lonely young woman, Sintel, helps and befriends a dragon, whom she calls Scales. But when he is kidnapped by an adult dragon, Sintel decides to embark on a dangerous quest.
